website_summaries.verdict: Despite missing a few tools found in other sets, this is a great choice for those who have their own stock pot and want to start canning.
pros: Includes two steel racks: one for jars, one for sterilizing lids
Two funnel sizes, including one with a detachable strainer
Other tools include a jar lifter, lid lifter, and cheesecloth
cons: Canning set does not include two tools generally found in such sets: a lid wrench and a bubble remover

customer_reviews.title: Rusted during first use.....
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited when I found this product, ordered it, and opted for quick shipping. Product came quickly. All looked well when I unwrapped and washed items to prepare for use. During the first canning process I noticed that my rack was rusting. This was very disappointing to me as the item is designed to be in water during use! How the heck ca it rust, well clearly I should have opted to purchase a more expensive canning rack (Ball or Williams Sanoma) because now I have to purchase one anyway to replace the new one that I just used once..... I will never recommend this product and am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Rack not stainless
customer_reviews.text: All of the components are good quality except for the rack ... it is NOT stainless. It started to rust with the first use. I paid $70+ for my canning pot and the rack put rust marks at the bottom of my pot. So I am really disappointed in this.
customer_reviews.author: nmcowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set. I like the lid rack quite a bit, although I do wish the handle didn't have a wooden know - I like to run utensils through the dishwasher. The magnet on the lid lifter is nice and strong. Again, as others have mentioned, the jar rack is very large. It is the full 12" described, so it doesn't fit into a 12" diameter pot. I haven't been able to use it since my pot is too small, but it seems that it is pretty nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Simi Vera

customer_reviews.title: Makes canning EASY!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these tools! The rack for the lids and rings is easy to use and makes sterilizing much easier. The funnels are good quality stainless steel and make filling jars a breeze. My favorite of all the items are the tongs. They are sturdy and I didn't have to worry about getting out small jars that don't fit into a canning rack. I would DEFINITELY recommend this set to anyone who does any serious canning.
customer_reviews.author: ib2qtpie

customer_reviews.title: No searching for all the pieces
customer_reviews.text: Nice to get everything you need in one set. Used it for the first time yesterday. Love the magnetic lid grabber, I can see using this to retrieve lost items around the house! And the two funnels are very handy. I did buy a different jar rack based on others comment that this one rusts.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality rack
customer_reviews.text: The rack isn't worth a buck. It's made with very thin wire, and is malformed in such a way that it does not sit stably on the rim of the pot. The rack did not fit my pot, I went to a local retailer and spent $25 for a pot which included a significantly better rack. The other included items are of better quality but can be had for much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love everything but the canning rack.
customer_reviews.text: The canning rack to hold the canning jars in the pot is HUGE! I don't have a pot big enough for it. I had to purchase a separate smaller one so I could can. I love everything else that is included and use it often.
customer_reviews.author: C Rousseau

customer_reviews.title: love to can
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Great quality. This was my first attempt at canning so I bought the 7 pc canning set to help me get started and I loved them. I have nothing bad to say about this set. I made blueberry marmalade and it was wonderful. I cant wait until next year to try something different.
customer_reviews.author: E2

customer_reviews.title: Good Set
customer_reviews.text: When people in other comments say the rack is "large," they mean it has a 12" diameter. Check your pots before buying! We haven't had much chance to use it all yet, but everything seems to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: good starting point
customer_reviews.text: got this because my wife wanted to start canning and it had everything to get the ball rolling for canning. its all basic stuff but allowed us to try it out
customer_reviews.author: semperfi363

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Looks decent for a starter kit for the money, has most all you need to start canning and being all metal should last.
customer_reviews.author: Bustoff

customer_reviews.title: A little better than OK
customer_reviews.text: I received this order within 2 weeks. All of the items were in good shape with the exception of the wire rack. One of the supports was not soldered/welded, making one handle come apart. This piece is flimsy and completely useless without the welding. Thankfully, I already had one. This being said, I have no other complaints. All items work well, and I fine the lid holder quite handy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlea Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: Quality stainless canning supplies
customer_reviews.text: Great set of basic canning supplies, everything you need to get started except a book. The only thing I'd say is that the rack is quite a bit larger than I expected from the description - you need a full-size canning pot to use it. Otherwise everything was great, just as described and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Davenport

customer_reviews.title: It would be great if...
customer_reviews.text: the rack is too wide for the pots I want to use. Otherwise all is well with this product. Great quality...beware of the size of the rack.
customer_reviews.author: Do What You Promise

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the hardcore canner!
customer_reviews.text: High Quality caner kit! makes canning easy. only think I would love to see added is a reusable Jelly bag.
customer_reviews.author: House of SQUISH

customer_reviews.title: great little set
customer_reviews.text: has everything you need for all your basic and intermediate canning needs. it will last a long time. great buy.
customer_reviews.author: camicat

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This kit has quality items and is much nicer than I expected for the price. The funnel strainer is an especially nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: High quality, easy to use and clean. More complete than many of the canning sets. I liked and used every item.
customer_reviews.author: camestres

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: Great products and materials all in one. Now just have to ensure I have access to quantity of fruits and vegetables and the time needed to preserve them.
customer_reviews.author: R Walker

customer_reviews.title: A Mixed Bag
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with much of this set, particularly the funnels, but disappointed with the racks. The description is a little unclear about the fact that only the funnels are stainless steel; the canning and lid racks do NOT appear to be. That's what I really needed to be stainless, but I do enjoy the rest of the set. I know it will hold up much better than my old plastic stuff. I'm just ordering a stainless steel rack separately, and that'll take care of the problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great value and lots of needed items for your first canning experience!
customer_reviews.text: Loved every piece! Great price for all items included! The funnels were an added benefit as I used them with both my Roma tomatoes and while making Black Raspberry Jam!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could've picked the color
customer_reviews.text: I understand why picking a color for this product wasn't an option, and I know color doesn't affect functionality, but I really, really hate green. Especially the shade of green that I received. (The picture showed red utensils at the time of my order; the new one shows black.) I'm sure I'll survive, though. Other than the icky green, this set is well worth the investment. Nothing in the set is superfluous. If you can even a little bit, you really should have these implements. Amazon's delivery was efficient, as usual, and everything came in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: N. Polzin

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This set contains all I needed to get going with my canning and I have been using it happily for months now and everything is well made and lasting well. There is only one small downside and that is the rack started to rust almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Very practical Set!
customer_reviews.text: I wish i'd found earlier this very practical and helpful set. Canning became fun and much easier with it. I recommend this to whoever loves canning !
customer_reviews.author: Dorit Dornier

customer_reviews.title: not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: not at all what I expected. The canning rack did not fit nicely in my large pot. And once it was used, it rusted at all the seams, leaving my nice stainless steel pot with rust marks as well, that eventually came off with time spent scrubbing. The lid holder as well began to tarnish after the first use. Aren't these items meant to be placed in boiling water for a good amount of time? So they really shouldn't be rusting or tarnishing. Everything else worked fine because it did not need to be placed in water for any duration of time.
customer_reviews.author: foodEnthusiast

customer_reviews.title: New to Canning
customer_reviews.text: This 7 piece set is all I needed to start canning with my new cannier, It is made well and I am looking forward to using it this summer.
customer_reviews.author: American Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Very Good. I received it just in time to do ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Good. I received it just in time to do some canning. It works as well as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Morrione

customer_reviews.title: Good stainless canning set
customer_reviews.text: I already have the red plastic canning kit - this is a great upgrade. It's a good and very complete canning set. The stainless steel is easier to clean and sterilize. Love the funnel with its filter insert. I love the lid holder. And the added natural cheesecloth was great, too. Like the other reviewer stated, the canning rack is huge. You'd need a full-sized pot to make it work, so if you're getting this what that item in mind, be aware.
customer_reviews.author: F. Friesema

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set as my intro to canning this year. I canned meat products so far and this set ready came in handy. It had all the items that I needed. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: tomangie

customer_reviews.title: Canning Set
customer_reviews.text: Just what was needed and at a great price makes canning so much easier to have everything in the set at you finger tips

customer_reviews.title: This set is great!
customer_reviews.text: This set has everything you need and it is all top of the line!! You will never have to replace any of it!

customer_reviews.text: Judah to get a chance to do that you'll be fine with it and I will remember the complete list is the land in my rtfm the land twwoblackcatz to make a bit more

customer_reviews.title: Has everything you need for canning and then some
customer_reviews.text: I will admit I cant use everything in this set. I gave away the basket to drop cans in the water because I didn't have a pot big enough and it really got in the way, but everything else in the set works wonderfully and I use it all frequently. I have been using this set since I started canning 4 years ago, nothing has worn out. I did a lot of research before I bought anything, and this is the best value for what you get. I also put everything (including the magnet) in the dishwasher and it all cleans up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: J. Breitwieser

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with all the components
customer_reviews.text: Have used this now for about 4 canning sessions in the last year. Really happy with all the components. The rack is my least favorite item; I wish I could find one with smaller openings at the base. Would also love some kind of a double-rack system but that's still eluding me. Definitely worth the price to get a functional set of canning tools.
customer_reviews.author: happyeverafter

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and Wrong Size
customer_reviews.text: The box mine arrived in was intact, but the fine tipped funnel and the lid holder were bent. The lid holder can still be used, but the funnel can not be used for what it was intended. The canning rack is about 1/6 inch too large for a 21.5 All American pressure canner/cooker, which makes it useless to me. The most useful parts of this package were the jar tongs, the magnetic lid lifter, and the wide mouth funnel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a fantastic husband that gardens and I can a lot. My other canning items I have are plastic, this set is just what I needed!!!! Pickled Okra, Jalapena jelly, pear jelly ..... Watch out, here I come! Seller was exceptional, package well protected, and product perfect, once again Amazon you have provided the best sellers and products, thank you, and keep up the good work!!!
customer_reviews.author: tried and true

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this to compliment a pressure canner. It has ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to compliment a pressure canner. It has all the extra bells and whistles need to get the job done.

customer_reviews.title: accessory review
customer_reviews.text: The items were bought with a 21 quart pressure cooker. Have not used them yet. Can say though that the wire rack does not fit snug in the base of the American Cooker. Just a little crooked, wouldn't seem to effect the final results though, we'll see. Quality appears good and more than I would have purchased separately and at a fair price Norpro 2478367600456 7-Piece Home Canning Set

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for years now to can food at home. They work great and is a fine addition to the All America Canner I purchased (  ).

customer_reviews.title: Better yet, we know what is in the jar
customer_reviews.text: Going back to some of the old ways, less energy used, less hormones & antibiotics. Better yet, we know what is in the jar.

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: I like this set because it has some canning essentials and some of the items are versatile. Getting it all in one set is convenient.

customer_reviews.text: This accessory set was perfect for the first time canner is trying to figure out what I needed and not break the bank along the way. It is a nice started set.

customer_reviews.text: My dad makes homemade BBQ sauce but he never bought himself a kit to aid him in cooking it. This was just the gift he needed. Great job Norpro!

customer_reviews.text: This kit was nicer than I expected and is a good starting point for launching into canning. I would add a larger funnel.

customer_reviews.text: Good set with all of the essentials. I especially like the holder for the lid flats. All seems to be good quality.

customer_reviews.title: Canning items
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the quality and selection of the items. I found all of the items useful. Could have used more of the lid holders.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made canning set. I especially like the lid tray, which makes handling hot lids very simple. I am very happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: canning all the tools you will ever need
customer_reviews.text: lid holders to funnels gar pick up to racks all very nice without these tools to do the job well you be the judge

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular set but no box!
customer_reviews.text: This set is absolutely awesome with only one drawback...it doesn't come in a box! It was all in a clear plastic bag that was twist-tied shut inside the shipping carton. Fine for myself but an unwanted surprise if you're giving it as a gift. Just wanted to give a heads-up. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make canning easier!
customer_reviews.text: The items in this set greatly help the canning process along. They have been used extensively and all work well.
customer_reviews.author: Hans Aubuchon

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a great product but.....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with a presser cooker/canner that I had to return as I have a ceramic top stove. The presser cooker/canner did not list online in the description that you cannot use it with a ceramic top stove, but in big bold red letters it stated this fact on the box top.
customer_reviews.author: B. Halstead

customer_reviews.title: Norpro Canning Set
customer_reviews.text: We started canning this year since we joined a local Farm Program. We use every single piece of this set. Easy to use and clean.

customer_reviews.title: good canning kit
customer_reviews.text: I have used this set for just one canning season, it was fine. The tools work well were sturdy and I expect many seasons or use.

customer_reviews.title: Great and as described
customer_reviews.text: Great product for canning. I thought it was as described and have used it successfully this late summer.

customer_reviews.title: Get this!
customer_reviews.text: If you're as serious about canning as I am, then this is a must for the kitchen. You get all your basic necessities (other than the pot) and they make the job a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila-Lee

product_meta.title: Norpro 7-Piece Home Canning Set
product_meta.description: Capture summer fruits and vegetables at their prime for enjoyment throughout the year by canning at home. This seven-piece canning kit provides all the essential tools needed for getting started. A jar lifter, a magnetic lid lifter, two canning funnels, sterilizing rack, canning rack, and natural cheese cloth. To safely remove hot jars and lids after they've been sterilized in boiling water, use the jar lifter to pick up the jars and the magnetic lid lifter to easily remove the lids, with no risk of burned fingers. Choose from two canning funnels. The wide mouth canning funnel directs ingredients into the jar quickly and cleanly and offers a wide design that accommodates both regular and wide-mouth jars. The narrow 6 inch funnel is excellent for straining into narrow jars and comes with a detachable strainer. Also available is our sterilizing rack that holds 12 canning lids, and our canning rack which is designed to hold jars as you lower and raise them from your cooking pot. (Holds up to 7 quart or 7 pint jars; 12-inch diameter fits most pots- keeps jars from touching each other or the canner). Made of steel and features elongated handles on either side for ease of use.
feature_bullets: 7-piece canning set provides the essentials needed for canning at home
Steel canning rack holds 7 pint- or quart-size jars; sterilizing rack holds 12 lids
Also includes 2 stainless-steel funnels, magnetic lid wand, jar lifter, and cheese cloth
Dishwasher-safe funnels and canning rack; hand-wash all other pieces
